attributes.action: We as a Christian nation place pressure on the government to close down the mosques that preach hate and to STOP the building of any more in the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we allow any more mosques to be built in this country, then Islamisation will seriously be in the forefront. We, the people know very well what the Muslims’ aim is, and that is to see Islam dominating, not just Britain but Europe also. The government must stop this religion taking over before it’s too late. Please think of the childrens' future.
